station_list.description:
List of SmogTok stations active in the last 30 days.
If you don't see your station, it may not be active anymore or it may be a new station. In that case, you can try to enter station ID manually (open integration setup again).

data_description.smogtok_station: Select SmogTok station from the list to configure.

station_id.description:
To get the SmogTok station ID:
1. go to https://smogtok.com/deviceslist
2. select the station from which you want to get data
3. the station ID is in the URL address, e.g. for https://smogtok.com/onedevice?probeId=3608 the station ID is 3608
